title: Unit 5: Analytical Applications of Differentiation
subtitle: Use derivatives for function analysis and optimization
description: Use derivatives to analyze function behavior, find extrema, and understand the shape of graphs.
objectives: Use derivatives to find critical points and extrema
Apply the first and second derivative tests
Understand the relationship between derivatives and function behavior
bigIdeas: Critical Points: Points where derivatives are zero or undefined
Extrema: Maximum and minimum values found using derivative analysis
Concavity: Second derivatives reveal the shape and behavior of functions
Curve Sketching: Using derivatives to understand and draw function graphs
Optimization: Finding optimal values using analytical techniques

lessons.title: Using the Mean Value Theorem
lessons.description: Understand and apply the Mean Value Theorem with reasoning and justification.

lessons.title: Extreme Value Theorem, Global vs Local Extrema, and Critical Points
lessons.description: Learn to identify and justify global and local extrema and critical points.

lessons.title: Determining Intervals Where a Function is Increasing or Decreasing
lessons.description: Analyze function behavior by examining intervals of increase and decrease.

lessons.title: Using the First Derivative Test to Determine Relative Extrema
lessons.description: Apply the first derivative test to find relative maxima and minima.

lessons.title: Using the Candidates Test to Determine Absolute Extrema
lessons.description: Use candidates test and technology to determine absolute extrema.

lessons.title: Determining Concavity of Functions Over Their Domains
lessons.description: Describe concavity and its relation to derivatives over function domains.

lessons.title: Using the Second Derivative Test to Determine Extrema
lessons.description: Apply the second derivative test for classifying extrema.

lessons.title: Sketching Graphs of Functions and Their Derivatives
lessons.description: Identify relationships between functions and their first and second derivatives.

lessons.title: Connecting a Function, Its First Derivative, and Its Second Derivative
lessons.description: Explore how the function and its derivatives relate graphically and analytically.

lessons.title: Introduction to Optimization Problems
lessons.description: Identify common structures in optimization problems involving derivatives.

lessons.title: Solving Optimization Problems
lessons.description: Explain and solve optimization problems with contextual understanding.

lessons.title: Exploring Behaviors of Implicit Relations
lessons.description: Apply rules and reasoning to analyze implicit relations.
